ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Sliding problems
ygData.msgSnippet: This is easy to replicate.  Hold down your arrow key then hold down shift as well.  Release your arrow key then realise shift. I found this issue too and just
ygData.messageBody:
This is easy to replicate. Hold down your arrow key then hold down shift as well. Release your arrow key then realise shift.

I found this issue too and just petitioned first before I reported to see if it was some new known issue with the game. When I told the GM if he ever wanted to get dizzy I'd tell him how he laughed :)

Anyway this is the first time I have seen this issue but I a told it's an old bug. Maybe something in the the patch has changed it in such a way that everything is all sensitive again?!

Jacana Mourningsong
Wood Elf Minstrel
Singing My Heart Out (202)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
